nolife.description: Caught 1000 Mayas! I don't know how you managed this.

catchrarest.description: Caught the elusive SHINY PUPPY MAYA! CONGO-RATS

firstgiftsent.description: Sent their first gift! Aren't you generous!

getjuked.description: GOT JUKED. You caught a FAKE Maya. But here is an achievement to make you feel better

inventory.description: Viewed their inventory for the first time. Nice. You pushed some buttons

achievements.description: Viewed their achievements for the first time. Here's an achievement I guess

worshipper.description: Used some emojis in their message that would make it seem that you worship Maya. Idk what to say. Cool?

smack.description: Used the SMACK command for the first time. NICE. GETTEM

quote.description: Used the quote command for the first time.

mayadonator.description: Donated a Maya for the first time!

polite.description: Used the hey command for the first time! Everyone always asks WHERE'S NEBULA BOT... Never how's Nebula bot :(

thefirstcatch.description: This user caught the VERY FIRST MAYA!

catchall.description: Caught every type of Maya! HECTIC.

R I C H.description: Donated 5 ultimate Mayas to the bot! THENKS
